snippet: Passage of the living wage bill by the City Council represented one of those moments in which symbolism and subtext trump text.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that passage of the living wage bill by the New York City Council represents one of those moments in which symbolism and subtext trump text; notes bill will positively affect about 0.013 percent of jobs in the city.
lead_paragraph: Passage of the living wage bill by the City Council represented one of those moments in which symbolism and subtext trump text.
